inspirojis.quote: Politics is not an exact science.
inspirojis.author: Otto von Bismark

inspirojis.quote: Never to lie is to have no lock on your door, you are never wholly alone.
inspirojis.author: Elizabeth Bowen

inspirojis.quote: If I ever have sex with someone I might be able to develop a sense of humor.
inspirojis.author: Kate Beckinsale

inspirojis.quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things that's all.
inspirojis.author: Harry Seidler

inspirojis.quote: Before Nelson Mandela was arrested in 1962, he was an angry, relatively young man. He founded the ANC's military wing. When he was released, he surprised everyone because he was talking about reconciliation and forgiveness and not about revenge.
inspirojis.author: Desmond Tutu

inspirojis.quote: Year by year we are learning that in this restless, strenuous American life of ours vacations are essential.
inspirojis.author: Ellsworth Huntington

inspirojis.quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
inspirojis.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

inspirojis.quote: Hey, I'm a Catholic deer hunter, I am happy to be clinging to my guns and my religion.
inspirojis.author: Paul Ryan

inspirojis.quote: And how can poetry stand up against its new conditions? Its position is perfectly precarious.
inspirojis.author: John C. Ransom
